channel.title: Lots of problems
channel.description:
i got lots of problems with mopar..
1. there are no npc's in wildy... no dragons.. nothing..
2. i was playin 2 people and fighting them.. but when one died it didnt drop nothin...
3. im in like varroc and when i go twards falador it frezez sayin loading...
4. i cant cast any spells but teleport..
5. i cant use arrows like kerils c bow i just go up and hit with it..
6. i try to make cape like fire and obby and it logs me out.. i get back in and it logs me out.. then deletes my acc...
i guess thats all for now anyways...
can anyone help me with any of my prpblems??? plzzz

item.title: Lots of problems
item.dc:creator: @_R_E_B_O_R_N ~R E B O R N~
item.description:
@_R_E_B_O_R_N wrote:

to change the guard into another npc like kalphite just open up your autospawn.cfg and then press Ctrl F and search for guard or something and change the id number, its the first numbers.

Read full topic

item.title: Lots of problems
item.dc:creator: @naruto001100 naruto001100
item.description:
@naruto001100 wrote:

i tried to turn a guard (0009)(ones in varrock) into kalphite queen (3835/3836) and it said it was added to the npc table how to i turn the guard into the queen??[br][size=1]Posted on: May 30, 2007, 07:14:12 PM[/size][hr]i fixed problem 3 and 6 but i still need help!!![br][size=1]Posted on: May 30, 2007, 07:35:14 PM[/size][hr]still need help… if any 1 could help i would appreciate it.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 01:34:57 PM[/size][hr]I still need help if anyone can offer it!

Read full topic
